metadata.title: Project Overview
metadata.subtitle: We Are ESAP
metadata.description: The ESAP Project - Exploring the meaning of life, consciousness, and existence. Learn about the three pillars, core values, and worldview framework.

escapeSection.intro: Essentially, we hope that everyone who participates in this project can escape from their former selves, or from what drags them down.
escapeSection.notEscaping: This is not about running away, but about:

participationIntro: If you're interested in sci-fi worldbuilding, enjoy pondering deep philosophical questions, want to express your emotions and thoughts, are willing to share your creations with others, or are looking for an "escape" outlet - ESAP welcomes you.

worldviewTimeline.epilogue: From then on, three androids lived, grew, and explored the meaning of life in the human world.

triangleQuote: You are unique in this world, don't let others control you

ending.line1: This world is too complex, and we often feel lost.
ending.line2: But perhaps, when you look up at the sky and see that artificial satellite, you'll remember:
ending.line3: Even if we've lost the natural starry sky, we can still make wishes.
ending.line4: Not because we believe fairy tales will come true, but because making a wish means you haven't given up yet.
ending.wishToSatellite: Make your wish upon that satellite.
ending.tagline: The ESAP Project - We Will Eventually Escape
